alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier, southeastern Hendry, northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, or 20 miles south of Lake Harbor, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Miccosukee Service Plaza and Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.
